Covering Fire (Critical Success).name: Covering Fire (Critical Success)
Covering Fire (Critical Success).description: Cannot take reactions triggered by maneuver war actions from any army until the start of your next turn.

False Retreat (Critical Success).name: False Retreat (Critical Success)
False Retreat (Critical Success).description: The target is unable to take reactions until the start of your next turn.

Reckless Flankers.name: Reckless Flankers
Reckless Flankers.description: Take a â€“2 circumstance penalty to your AC in order to gain a +1 circumstance bonus on attack rolls. If you do so, these modifiers remain in effect until you are no longer engaged.
